Translations.Text: Jevha akasa vidirna ho'ila
Ani jevha tare jhadatila (galuna padatila)
Ani jevha samudra vahuna jatila
Ani jevha kabarinna (phaduna) ukhaduna takale ja'ila
Tya veli pratyeka manusya, tyane je kahi pudhe pathavile ani mage sodale (arthata apalya pudhacya magacya karmanna) januna ghe'ila
He manava! Tula apalya dayalu palanakartyababata konatya gostine bahakavile
Jya (palanakartyane) tula nirmana kele, maga yathayogya kele, maga (suyogyaritya) vyavasthita ghadavile
Jya rupata icchile tula banavile ani tula ghadavile
Mulica nahi, kimbahuna tumhi tara siksa ani mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavita
Nihsansaya, tumacyavara raksaka (paharekari)
Sanmanita lihinare niyukta aheta
Je kahi tumhi karata, te janatata
Nihsansaya, neka - sadacari loka (jannatace aisa'arama ani) denagyanni labhanvita asatila
Ani niscitaca va'ita (duracari) loka jahannamamadhye asatila
Mobadalyacya divasi ticyata pravesa karatila
Te ticyatuna kadhihi gayaba ho'u sakanara nahita
Ani tumhala kahi mahitahi ahe ki mobadalyaca divasa kaya ahe
Mi dusaryanda (sangato ki) tumhala kaya mahita ki mobadalyaca (ani sikseca) divasa kaya ahe
(To asa ki) jya divasi koni manusya, kona manasakarita kasalyahi gostica adhikara balaganara nasela ani samasta adesa tya divasi allahaceca asatila
Mothi va'ita avastha ahe mapa-tolamadhye kami karanaryansathi
Ki jevha lokankaduna mapa mojuna ghetata tevha purepura mojuna ghetata
Ani jevha tyanna mapa mojuna kinva tola karuna detata, tevha kami detata
Kaya tyanna apalya mrtyunantara jivanta ho'una uthanyababataca visvasa nahi
Tya mahana divasakarita
Jya divasi sarva loka, sarva visvancya palanakartyasamora ubhe asatila
Nihsansaya, duracari lokanca karma-lekha ‘sijjina’ madhye ahe
Tumhala kaya mahita ‘sijjina’ kaya ahe
(Ha tara) likhita grantha ahe
Tya divasi khote uthavinaryanci mothi durdasa ahe
Je mobadala ani siksecya divasala khote tharavitata
Yala phakta toca khote tharavito, jo maryadece ullanghana karanara ani aparadhi asato
Jevha tyacyasamora amacya ayati vacalya jatata tevha to mhanato ki he tara purvicya lokance kis'se aheta
Ase nahi, kimbahuna tyancya manavara tyancya karmammule ganja (cadhalela) ahe
Evadheca nahi. He loka tya divasi apalya palanakartyacya darsanapasuna vancita thevale jatila
Maga ya lokanna niscitapane jahannamamadhye phekuna dile ja'ila
Maga tyanna sangitale ja'ila ki heca ahe te, jyala tumhi khote tharavita rahile
Nihsansaya, satkarmi lokanca karma-lekha ‘illiyina’ madhye ahe
Tumhala kaya mahita ki ‘illiyina’ kaya ahe
(To tara) likhita grantha ahe
Allahace nikatavarti (phariste) hajara asatata
Nihsansaya, neka sadacari loka (mothya) sukha-samadhanata asatila
Asananvara basuna pahata asatila
Tumhi tyancya ceharyavarunaca (allahacya) krpa denagyanci praphullata olakhala
Ya lokanna sud'dha nirbhela madya pajale ja'ila
Jyavara kasturici mohara lagali asela. Iccha karanaryanni tyacica iccha keli pahije
Ani tyata ‘tasnima’ce misrana asela
(Arthata) to jhara, jyace pani, allahace sannidhya labhalele loka pitila
Nihsansaya, aparadhi loka imana rakhanarya lokanci thatta udavita asata
Ani tyancya javaluna jatana netra kataksa (va isaryane) tyaca apamana karita asata
Ani jevha apalya lokankade parata yeta, tevha thatta - maskari karita asata
Ani jevha tyanna pahata, tevha ase mhanata, niscitaca he loka vata cukalele aheta
Yanna, tyacyavara niriksaka banavuna tara nahi pathavile gele
Tevha aja imana rakhanare ya inkari lokanvara hasatila
Asananvara virajamana ho'una pahata asatila
Ki ata ya inkara karanaryanni, jase karma te karita hote, tyaca purepura mobadala prapta karuna ghetala
